characterabilities.name: Blade Shield
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods, Warriors of the Old Faith]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Circle Orboros, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Grymkin, Infernals, Ios, Khador, Khymaera, Legion of Everblight, Llael, Ord, Orgoth, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Skorne, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance, Trollbloods, Warriors of the Old Faith.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Prey
characterabilities.description: After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. This model gains +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against it's prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.

characterabilities.name: Sidestep
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

characterabilities.name: Spring Blades
characterabilities.description: If a model hits this model with a melee attack, the attacking model suffers d3 damage points immediately after the attack is resolved unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.
